Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style or Grand Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; above, part of lotus bud pattern in added white outline with added red centre; below, two faded white bands above single red band; exterior: black and red bands.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the exterior decoration, see Reading 26.2.67.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0662) (phase 2)
